subject: Re: new files posted in FB_12-6-07 folder from fb#12

full_text:
Nice stuff, Bruce.  I also like the portal idea.  

The ghosts (negative spirits) would be the ones seeking attachment.  
So if those guides from the light bring them to speak, then they 
would have to assist in moving them onward - keeping them away, etc.  

BTW: Has anyone tried sending any ghosties unto the light through 
this device, yet?

LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
